TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ClaimsIdentity extends System.Object implements class System.Security.Principal.IIdentity

summary.span: 表示基于声明的标识。

span.span: Represents a claims-based identity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是基于声明的标识的具体实现，即，一个标识描述的声明集合。The class is a concrete implementation of a claims-based identity; that is, an identity described by a collection of claims. 声明是有关实体所做的颁发者的描述的属性，对或该实体的某些其他质量的语句。A claim is a statement about an entity made by an issuer that describes a property, right, or some other quality of that entity. 这样的实体被认为是主体的声明。Such an entity is said to be the subject of the claim. 声明由类。A claim is represented by the class. 中包含的声明描述的实体的相应标识表示，并可以在进行授权和身份验证决策。The claims contained in a describe the entity that the corresponding identity represents, and can be used to make authorization and authentication decisions. 基于声明的访问模型具有更传统以独占方式依赖于角色的访问模型相比有众多优势。A claims-based access model has many advantages over more traditional access models that rely exclusively on roles. 例如，声明可以提供有关标识它们表示，可用于授权或身份验证中更特定的方式计算更加丰富的信息。For example, claims can provide much richer information about the identity they represent and can be evaluated for authorization or authentication in a far more specific manner. 从.NET Framework 4.5 开始，Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 和基于声明的标识已完全集成到.NET Framework。Beginning with .NET Framework 4.5, Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) and claims-based identity have been fully integrated into the .NET Framework. 这意味着现在表示.NET Framework 中的标识的许多类派生自和描述的声明集合通过其属性。This means that many classes that represent an identity in the .NET Framework now derive from and describe their properties through a collection of claims. 这是不同于以前版本的.NET Framework 中，在其中实现这些类直接接口。This is different from previous versions of the .NET Framework, in which, these classes implemented the interface directly. 可以通过访问的描述标识声明的集合属性。The collection of claims that describe the identity can be accessed through the property. 类提供了几种方法来查找和修改声明，并完全支持语言集成查询 (LINQ)。The class provides several methods for finding and modifying claims and fully supports language integrated queries (LINQ). 在应用程序代码中，对象通常通过访问对象; 例如，通过返回的主体。In application code, objects are typically accessed through objects; for example, the principal returned by . > [!NOTE] > 类具有属性。The class has a property as well. 在大多数情况下，您应访问通过用户的声明集合而不通过集合。In the majority of cases you should access the user’s claims through the collection rather than through the collection. 将需要访问个人的声明仅在当主体包含多个并且需要进行评估，或修改特定的标识。You will need to access the claims of an individual only in the cases where the principal contains more than one and you need to evaluate or modify a specific identity. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要添加或删除来自声明集合，调用方必须具有完全信任。To add or remove claims from the collection, a caller must have full trust. 在基于声明的模型中，属性和方法实现通过评估所包含的标识的声明。In the claims-based model, the property and the method are implemented by evaluating the claims contained by an identity. 提供基于声明的模型中的基实现属性和方法。The base implementations in the claims-based model are provided by the property and the method. 和属性，可以指定应该用于评估时执行这些操作由标识所包含的声明的声明类型。The and properties enable you to specify a claim type that should be used to evaluate the claims contained by the identity when performing these operations. 通过支持委派方案和属性。Delegation scenarios are supported through the and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示的实例的属性值分配类从提供给构造函数。The following table shows the property value assignments for an instance of the class from the provided to the constructor. | PropertyProperty | “值”Value | | -------- | ----- | ||如果的值`other.Actor`属性不是`null`，则`other.Actor`克隆和分配; 否则为`null`。If the value of the `other.Actor` property isn't `null`, the `other.Actor` is cloned and assigned; otherwise, `null`.| ||`other.AuthenticationType` 属性的值。The value of the `other.AuthenticationType` property.| ||`other.BootstrapContext` 属性的值。The value of the `other.BootstrapContext` property.| ||`List`的声明，如果有的话，在`other.Claims`属性。The `List` of claims, if any, in the `other.Claims` property.| ||`other.Label` 属性的值。The value of the `other.Label` property.| ||`other.NameClaimType` 属性的值。The value of the `other.NameClaimType` property.| ||`other.RoleClaimType` 属性的值。The value of the `other.RoleClaimType` property.| ||如果`other.CustomSerializationData`不是`null`，`other.CustomSerializationData`克隆和分配; 否则为`null`。If `other.CustomSerializationData` isn't `null`, `other.CustomSerializationData` is cloned and assigned; otherwise, `null`.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示了 类的某个实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the class. |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||如果`identity`是从赋值的值`identity.Actor`属性; 否则为`null`。If `identity` is assignable from , the value of the `identity.Actor` property; otherwise, `null`.| ||值`identity.AuthenticationType`() 使用属性。The value of the `identity.AuthenticationType` () property is used.| ||如果`identity`是从赋值的值`identity.BootStrapContext`属性; 否则为`null`。If `identity` is assignable from , the value of the `identity.BootStrapContext` property; otherwise, `null`.| ||如果`identity`是从赋值，从声明`identity`添加到新实例; 否则为一个空集合。If `identity` is assignable from , the claims from `identity` are added to the new instance; otherwise, an empty collection.| ||**注意：** 访问的值时属性基于的值返回属性。**Note:** When accessed, the value of the property is returned based on the value of the property.| ||如果`identity`是从赋值的值`identity.Label`属性; 否则为`null`。If `identity` is assignable from , the value of the `identity.Label` property; otherwise, `null`.| ||如果`identity`不能从，不是`null`，并且具有属性不是`null`; 名称声明添加到使用的值的新实例属性。If `identity` is not assignable from , is not `null`, and has an property that is not `null`; a name claim is added to the new instance using the value of the property. **注意：** 访问的值时，则返回属性根据和集合。**Note:** When accessed, the value of the property is returned based on the and the collection.| ||如果`identity`是从赋值的值`identity.NameClaimType`属性是使用; 否则为使用。If `identity` is assignable from , the value of the `identity.NameClaimType` property is used; otherwise, is used.| ||如果`identity`是从赋值的值`identity.RoleClaimType`属性是使用; 否则为使用。If `identity` is assignable from , the value of the `identity.RoleClaimType` property is used; otherwise, is used.|

否则为`null`。If `identity` is assignable from , the value of the `identity.BootStrapContext` property; otherwise, `null`.| ||初始化从`claims`参数。Initialized from the `claims` parameter. 如果`identity`是从赋值，从声明`identity`添加到之前所指定的新实例`claims`参数。If `identity` is assignable from , the claims from `identity` are added to the new instance before those specified by the `claims` parameter.| ||**注意：** 访问的值时属性基于的值返回属性。**Note:** When accessed, the value of the property is returned based on the value of the property.| ||如果`identity`是从赋值的值`identity.Label`属性; 否则为`null`。If `identity` is assignable from , the value of the `identity.Label` property; otherwise, `null`.| ||如果`identity`不能从，不是`null`，并且具有属性不是`null`; 名称声明添加到使用的值的新实例属性。If `identity` is not assignable from , is not `null`, and has an property that is not `null`; a name claim is added to the new instance using the value of the property. **注意：** 访问的值时，则返回属性根据和集合。**Note:** When accessed, the value of the property is returned based on the and the collection.| ||`nameType` 参数的值。The value of the `nameType` parameter. 但是，如果的值`nameType`参数是`null`或空字符串并`identity`是从赋值的值`identity.NameClaimType`属性是使用; 否则为使用。However, if the value of the `nameType` parameter is `null` or an empty string and `identity` is assignable from , the value of the `identity.NameClaimType` property is used; otherwise, is used.| ||`roleClaimType` 参数的值。The value of the `roleClaimType` parameter. 但是，如果的值`roleClaimType`参数是`null`或空字符串，并标识是从赋值的值`identity.RoleClaimType`属性是使用; 否则为使用。However, if the value of the `roleClaimType` parameter is `null` or an empty string and identity is assignable from , the value of the `identity.RoleClaimType` property is used; otherwise, is used.|

summary.span: 获取或设置被授予委派权利的调用方的标识。

span.span: Gets or sets the identity of the calling party that was granted delegation rights.

value.span: 授予委托权利的调用方。

span.span: The calling party that was granted delegation rights.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以访问通过以递归方式检查导致当前调用的委派链属性。An application can access the delegation chain that led to the current call, by recursively examining the property. 可以通过访问的令牌以其名义委托调用属性。The token on whose behalf the call is being delegated can be accessed through the property.

exception.span: 尝试设置当前实例的属性。

span.span: An attempt to set the property to the current instance occurs.

span.span: Adds a single claim to this claims identity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 检查声明和使用者是否不同于此声明标识，方法调用使用了此声明标识作为参数，以使用正确的使用者创建新的声明。The claim is examined and if the subject is different than this claims identity, the method is invoked with this claims identity as the parameter to create a new claim with the correct subject. 此方法具有`SecurityCritical`属性应用于哪些实体可以添加为标识声明的控件。This method has the `SecurityCritical` attribute applied to control which entities can add claims to the identity. 进一步向下管道，授权决策对基于中存在的声明集合。Further down the pipe, authorization decisions are made based on the claims that are present in the collection.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于创建此声明标识的令牌。

span.span: Gets or sets the token that was used to create this claims identity.
The bootstrap context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基础对象是实例类。The underlying object is an instance of the class. 设置`saveBootstrapContext`上的特性[ <identityConfiguration> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/identityconfiguration.md)或[ <securityTokenHandlerConfiguration> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlerconfiguration.md)要指定该令牌是否用于生成的配置文件中的元素应保留在属性。Set the `saveBootstrapContext` attribute on either the [<identityConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/identityconfiguration.md) or the [<securityTokenHandlerConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlerconfiguration.md) element in a configuration file to specify whether the token used to generate the should be preserved in the property. 如果属性不是`null`，应用程序可以通过属性和方法访问原始令牌和声明它生成类。If the property is not `null`, applications can access the original token and the claims it produced through the properties and methods of the class.

permission.span: 设置操作的直接调用方需要完全信任。

span.span: Set operation requires full trust for the immediate caller.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Claims As IEnumerable(Of Claim)

summary.span: 获取与此声明标识关联的声明。

span.span: Gets the claims associated with this claims identity.

value.span: 与此声明标识相关联的声明的集合。

span.span: The collection of claims associated with this claims identity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中可能包含相关的条目。 `null`。The collection may contain entries that are `null`. 中包含的声明集合实质上是描述由表示该实体。The claims contained in the collection essentially describe the entity that is represented by the . 声明描述的属性和权限所拥有的实体，并可以由应用程序做出有关身份验证和授权检查。The claims describe the properties and rights possessed by the entity and can be examined by applications to make decisions about authentication and authorization. > [!NOTE] > 类具有属性。The class has a property as well. 在大多数情况下，您应访问通过用户的声明集合而不通过集合。In the majority of cases you should access the user’s claims through the collection rather than through the collection. 将需要访问个人的声明仅在当主体包含多个并且需要进行评估，或修改特定的标识。You will need to access the claims of an individual only in the cases where the principal contains more than one and you need to evaluate or modify a specific identity.

span.span: The claim to remove.

summary.span: 尝试从声明标识中移除一个声明。

span.span: Attempts to remove a claim from the claims identity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能无法删除该声明，因为它不归标识它。It is possible that the claim cannot be removed because it is not owned by the identity. 例如，这将是角色声明的主体拥有的这种情况。For example, this would be the case for role claims that are owned by the principal. 与不同方法，它将返回一个布尔值，该值指示是否已移除的声明，将引发异常，如果无法删除该声明Unlike the method, which returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the claim has been removed, throws an exception if the claim could not be removed 指定的声明所匹配的对象引用 ()。The specified claim is matched by object reference (). 此方法具有`SecurityCritical`属性应用于哪些实体可以删除声明的标识中的控件。This method has the `SecurityCritical` attribute applied to control which entities can remove claims from the identity. 进一步向下管道，授权决策对基于中存在的声明集合。Further down the pipe, authorization decisions are made based on the claims that are present in the collection.

span.span: The claim cannot be removed.

public: property System::String ^ RoleClaimType { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取将解释为此声明标识中声明的 .NET Framework 角色的声明类型。

span.span: Gets the claim type that will be interpreted as a .NET Framework role among the claims in this claims identity.
The role claim type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 角色声明类型是声明类型 () 时评估此标识使用方法。The role claim type is the claim type () that is used when evaluating this identity for the method. 方法调用以确定当前主体是否属于指定角色。The method is called to determine whether the current principal is in a specified role. 基于声明的模型扩展了此检查用于提供主体的声明。The claims-based model extends this check to use claims presented by the principal. 一个对象可包含一个或多个对象和标识的每个对象可以包含多个对象。A object can contain one or more objects and each identity object can contain multiple objects. 属性指定应该用于为角色提供的值时评估此声明的声明类型对象。The property specifies the claim type of the claim that should be used to provide the value for the role when evaluating this object. 该属性设置由构造函数。The property is set by the constructor. 常用的值是。A common value is .
